SDL2_image
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SDL2_image installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SDL2_image, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SDL2_image/2.8.2-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
